description:
### Salary Information

  • **FF/EMT Position**:
  • Base Salary: $43,334 annually
  • Hourly Wage: $15.05 (equates to $39,000 per year)
  • Holiday Pay: $4,334 annually
  • **FF/Paramedic Position**:
  • Base Salary: $51,110 annually
  • Hourly Wage: $15.05 (equates to $39,000 per year)
  • Holiday Pay: $4,334 annually
  • Medic Incentive: $3.00 per hour (equates to $7,776 annually)
  • Work Schedule**: The role involves a 24/48-hour work schedule totaling 2,592 hours per year.

### Benefits Overview

  • **Retirement and Leave**:
  • FRS Pension Plan
  • 13 Kelly Days
  • 12 Paid Holidays
  • Vacation Accrual and Buyback
  • Sick Leave Accrual
  • Personal Holidays
  • Bereavement Leave
  • Overtime Opportunities
  • Shift Exchanges
  • **Health and Insurance**:
  • Comprehensive Health Insurance
  • Dental Insurance
  • Vision Plan
  • Deferred Compensation Plans
  • **Additional Perks**:
  • Uniforms and related equipment provided by the City of Tavares
  • Annual medical health screening covered by the City of Tavares
  • Opportunities for promotion and career advancement

### Tobacco Policy

Candidates are required to be non-users of tobacco products for at least one year immediately prior to application, as supported by a sworn affidavit in compliance with XXXVI Florida Statute, Chapter 633, Section 34.

Employment Type: Full-Time
